description: Paysmart Request to cancel a Membership
name: Paysmart Member Cancellation

elements.name: MessageOne
elements.text: This form must be initiated by the a Gracie Barra Representative.

elements.name: Message
elements.text: This Member Cancellation form was not intended for you to complete. Please contact your GB School to inform them of the mistake.

events.name: Get Member
Clear Member Details

elements.name: The last debit will be taken on HTML
The last debit will be taken on
elements.label: Cancellation Date(no payment made)

elements.name: Please explain in detail your request for cancellation
elements.label: Please explain in detail your request for cancellation

elements.name: Document Information
elements.text: Please provide the list of documents you are submitting to prove the reason for your membership cancellation request.

elements.name: Terms Information
elements.text:
The student's installment payments must be current and up to date prior to submitting the application.

For any cancellation request, the appropriate document must be provided:

- Change of address; bill or lease agreement for the new address
- Medical condition; doctor's letter proving the permanent disability
- Document proving deployment
- Document proving loss of employment

Students who would like to cancel without reason must give 60 days written notice.

Your request will be evaluated and you will be contacted within 3 business days.

elements.requiredMessage: Gracie Barra Representative Signature is required
